Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Even in a game, we still have to regroup after every battle.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even though we needed to find Liv as soon as possible, maintenance and preparation must never be treated with a light heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Our equipment has durability. Spending a little more time now may save us big troubles in future battles.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "True. Okay, I'll check our status. Is anyone poisoned?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant, are you?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't you just check the menu?", 3: '9', 4: "I don't think so.", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'No...? What about the antidotes I collected?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Are you that disappointed that Commandant isn't poisoned? You could have used the menu to check our status in the first place!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Menu, right! I almost forget!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui immediately opened his menu and navigated to the team page.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hmm... Everybody's looking pretty good. Liv doesn't seem to be injured, although we still don't know where she is.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia often used this menu to check Liv's condition and determine where the team was heading next."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh, there's one thing...", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '17', 4: 'Is anyone hurt?', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I just realized Karenina wasn't in our team.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "No, but I just realized Karenina wasn't in our team.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Huh? Does it matter?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But we are moving together as teammates. Isn't it strange if you are not displayed in our team?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Not at all. I'm not 【kuroname】. Don't take me as your teammate just because we are moving together!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "But just like how we guessed Liv's condition, Vera or Camu may be able to locate you from their menu.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Are you suggesting I am a liability?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm only talking from a safety perspective. You aren't going back either, are you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That doesn't mean I'm going to join you. The reason I played this game was to win over Lucia...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "When the time comes, you can just leave the team. You have your own plans, right? That's why you didn't go back but chose to move with us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant, help us! Let Karenina stay.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I want Karenina to be my teammate!', 3: '2001', 4: 'Just do us a favor, will you?', 5: '2002'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What the heck are you talking about...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina was struggling. Ever since she knew that players could jump to other teams, she had been staring at her own team menu.'}
{3: 'Everybody knew what she was thinking.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph! It's only temporary! Temporary, remember!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina joined the team.'}
